Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
ComplexityMeasuresExtends from the ExtendedDataset class and implements all the complexity measures proposed by Ho and Basu (2002) and some new measures
DatasetImplements methods to read, manipulate, and print data
DateImplements methods to initialize and compare dates
DateContainerImplements method to create, transform, and delete date strings
DistanceFunctionAbstract class that defines the distance function classes behavior
DistNodeMaintains an index and a distance
EuclideanFunctionImplements the Euclidean distance function for continuous attributes
ExtendedDatasetExtends from the Dataset class and introduces new functionalities
HeapTree< Elem >Implements a max-heap
InputOptionsParses and stores the command line options
MatrixImplements methods to store, transform, and operate with matrices
NormalizedEuclideanFunctionImplements the normalized Euclidean distance function for continuous attributes
OverlapFunctionImplements the overlap distance function for nominal attributes
ResultsContainerStores the results
StdWeightedEuclideanFunctionImplements the standard-deviation weighted Euclidean distance for continuous attributes
StringTokenizerImplements a string tokenizer class to break strings into tokens
UtilsImplements utilities
VDMFunctionImplements the VDM distance function for nominal attributes
Vector< Etype >Implements a Vector class like Java class Vector
